segments.text: Thank you for your entertaining me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Today I'll invite you to enjoy the seafood.Please make yourself at home .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Excuse me , what business are you looking after in Germany ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am running Chinese arts and crafts .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What arts and crafts are you interested in this time ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I hope to import some silk from Hangzhou to Germany . Can you help me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure , I'll certainly help you do it .
segments.speaker: S2
